original_solution_mapping.L2: On Tuesday Kendra saw 5 sites x 5 birds/site = <<5*5=25>>25 different birds

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5957.
    Returns: the average number of different birds Kendra saw per site.
    """
    # L1
    monday_sites = 5 # On Monday they visited 5 sites
    monday_avg_birds = 7 # saw an average of 7 birds at each site
    monday_total_birds = monday_sites * monday_avg_birds

    # L2
    tuesday_sites = 5 # On Tuesday, Kendra visited 5 sites
    tuesday_avg_birds = 5 # saw an average of 5 birds at each site
    tuesday_total_birds = tuesday_sites * tuesday_avg_birds

    # L3
    wednesday_sites = 10 # On Wednesday visited 10 sites
    wednesday_avg_birds = 8 # saw an average of 8 birds at each site
    wednesday_total_birds = wednesday_sites * wednesday_avg_birds

    # L4
    total_birds_seen = monday_total_birds + tuesday_total_birds + wednesday_total_birds

    # L5
    total_sites_visited = monday_sites + tuesday_sites + wednesday_sites

    # L6
    average_birds_per_site = total_birds_seen / total_sites_visited

    # FA
    answer = average_birds_per_site
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: On Monday Kendra saw {monday_sites} sites x {monday_avg_birds} birds/site = <<{monday_sites}*{monday_avg_birds}={monday_total_birds}>>{monday_total_birds} different birds
On Tuesday Kendra saw {tuesday_sites} sites x {tuesday_avg_birds} birds/site = <<{tuesday_sites}*{tuesday_avg_birds}={tuesday_total_birds}>>{tuesday_total_birds} different birds
On Wednesday Kendra saw {wednesday_sites} sites x {wednesday_avg_birds} birds/site = <<{wednesday_sites}*{wednesday_avg_birds}={wednesday_total_birds}>>{wednesday_total_birds} different birds

In total Kendra saw {monday_total_birds} birds + {tuesday_total_birds} birds + {wednesday_total_birds} birds = <<{monday_total_birds}+{tuesday_total_birds}+{wednesday_total_birds}={total_birds_seen}>>{total_birds_seen} different birds
In total Kendra visited {monday_sites} sites + {tuesday_sites} sites + {wednesday_sites} sites = <<{monday_sites}+{tuesday_sites}+{wednesday_sites}={total_sites_visited}>>{total_sites_visited} sites.

On average Kendra saw {total_birds_seen} birds / {total_sites_visited} sites = <<{total_birds_seen}/{total_sites_visited}={average_birds_per_site}>>{average_birds_per_site} different birds at each site
